name: Datadog
description: Monitor metrics, logs, incidents, and more in Datadog

env.name: Datadog API Key
env.description: Your Datadog API key, obtainable from Organization Settings > API Keys.

env.name: Datadog Application Key
env.description: Your Datadog Application key, obtainable from Organization Settings > Application Keys.

env.name: Datadog Site Domain
env.description: Datadog site domain for API calls (e.g., datadoghq.com, datadoghq.eu).

env.name: Datadog Logs Endpoint
env.description: Optional. If using different endpoint for logs API; defaults to DD_SITE.

env.name: Datadog Metrics Endpoint
env.description: Optional. If using different endpoint for metrics API; defaults to DD_SITE.
